meanings.definition: The act of making a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The citifications of new neighborhoods brought more people to the city.
meanings.sent2: Urban citifications have transformed the landscape of our town.
meanings.sent3: The citifications of the small village made it feel like a bustling metropolis.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for citifications turned the once quiet town into a vibrant city.
meanings.sent5: The citifications of the area were so rapid that it felt like a city sprouted overnight.

meanings.sent1: We observed the citifications happening in the downtown area.
meanings.sent2: Citifications often involve the construction of new buildings and roads.
meanings.sent3: The citifications of the city seemed like a giant puzzle being put together.
meanings.sent4: The citifications of the neighborhood were like watching a city grow from scratch.
meanings.sent5: The citifications of the town were a testament to progress and growth.

meanings.sent1: The citifications of the region attracted many new residents.
meanings.sent2: Citifications bring about changes in infrastructure and lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: Living in the citifications meant being surrounded by the energy of the city.
meanings.sent4: The citifications of the area marked a shift towards a more urban environment.
meanings.sent5: The citifications of the town signaled a shift towards a more modern way of life.
